title: Grandma's Stuffing Balls
directions: * 1 Break bread into cube sized pieces, let dry overnight.
* 2 Melt the butter in a large skillet, add celery and onion, sauteâ€™ until tender.
* 3 Pour butter, celery & onion over bread crumbs.
* 5 Add enough turkey broth to hold bread together, not sticky. Shape bread into balls and bake until browned, at 350 degrees
ingredients: *1 egg and add milk to make total 1 cup
